title: Marketing T level consultation - have your say

content.text: The Institute for Apprenticeships and Technical Education (IfATE) is running a public consultation on the Outline Content for an upcoming Marketing Technical Qualification.

We welcome views from providers, employers, and industries bodies. The Outline Content aims to provide learners with the marketing specific knowledge and skills to progress to employment within the industry and the foundation knowledge that would support progression to higher education courses.
If you are a provider or industry body and would like to give your feedback please take part in our short survey in order to help us find out:
We ask that responses are in by no later than midnight 3 October 2022.
All responses will be considered by a panel of employers in order to finalise the Outline Content.
We expect to publish the final Marketing T Level Outline Content in early 2023 ahead of first delivery in September 2025.
